name: Scorn DLC: The Death Of Last
name_original: Scorn DLC: The Death Of Last
description:
Scorn DLC: The Death Of Last is a shooter game developed by Ebb Software. It came out on 02-06-2023. Ebb Software published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Scorn DLC: The Death Of Last is available on PC and Xbox Series S/X.
It was produced by Geoff Keighley and Jordan Peele. John Ribbins and Jordan Peele directed the game. It was scored by Geoff Keighley and Solar Fields.
